title: Audio Lead, Games Studio (Blue)
overview: The Audio Lead position is responsible for defining and implementing the audio vision for a brand-new AAA multi-platform game, including sound effects, music, character dialog, and all other audio content, as well as managing and mentoring the audio team and external partners. The ideal candidate has 5+ years of experience as an Audio Director or Lead, expertise in industry standard audio tools, excellent communication and leadership skills, and a hunger for learning and delivering a world-class experience.
